copy.desc8001: Leaves from the mightiest of trees!
copy.desc8002: The most popular leaf in Autumn Forest!
copy.desc8003: Great for making clothing and accessories!
copy.desc8004: Velvety Rose Petals are used for soft and delicate garments!
copy.desc8005: Daisies are perfect for playful and fun-loving Fairies and Sparrow Men!
copy.desc8006: Lily Petals add extra cheer to clothing!
copy.desc8007: The golden glow from these petals brightens up any creation!
copy.desc8008: Friendly spiders give Fairies thread for sewing!
copy.desc8009: Plentiful and sturdy, grass is the perfect material for clothing!
copy.desc8010: Buttons, brooches, and buckles are made from Sunflower Seeds!
copy.desc8011: Teapots, baskets, dinnertime bowls -- and dinner itself! Acorns are used for all kinds of things!
copy.desc8012: Plump berries perfect for dyes, baking or serving cold with sweet milk!
copy.desc8013: Fluff makes anything cozy and warm!
copy.desc8014: Juicy and delicious, everyone wants to pick these yummy treats!
copy.desc8015: The needles of Never Pines are sharp and flexible!
copy.desc8016: Snowflakes can be used for fine details on almost anything!
copy.desc8017: A sticky and sweet ingredient - perfect for baking, tinkering and more!
copy.desc8018: Sturdy and strong, yet bendy and pliable - just what the Tinker ordered!
copy.desc8019: A delicious and rare treat - a favorite of Baking Talents everywhere!
copy.desc8020: These beautiful gems are used by Tinker Talents in all sorts of surprising ways!
copy.desc8021: Giving off a faint glow, these gems are often used for making lamps!
copy.desc8022: A soft and useful gift from our feathered friends!
copy.desc8023: Super rare and super useful - this is a Tinker's jackpot!
copy.desc13003: Guide the caterpillar around the track to cut out the pattern. Be sure to jump the hurdles or you will lose points.
copy.desc13004: Complete your pattern by placing the shapes inside the lines in the right spots.
copy.desc13005: Help the spider stitch your pattern by clicking when she's over the center of the target!
copy.desc13006: Use the paddle to bounce the roly-poly bug and spread color as much as possible before your dye runs out.
copy.desc13038: Measure out the batter by pouring it into cups.
copy.desc13039: Bake your treats in the oven by heating up the fires.
copy.desc13040: Mix up the batter at just the right speed.
copy.desc13041: Match the ingredients to make something fun!
copy.desc13050: Click on the correct color yarn balls on the left to knit the pattern. Knitting the wrong color loses points!
copy.desc13051: Use the shell razor to shave the colors of fur you need off the caterpillar. Don't shave the wrong fur though!
copy.desc13052: Find the buttons you need from the tray and put them in the pink pouch to complete the level.
copy.desc13053: Use the beads to make the displayed patterns. You have to be quick though or the patterns will move!
copy.desc13054: Move the cupcakes along the conveyer belt by matching the correct frosting and sprinkles!
copy.desc13055: Fill in the design that youâ€™ve chosen with the colors from the paint palette.
copy.desc13056: placeholder description for gem dazzle minigame

copy.desc28501: Snow Angel sent to a user from the meadow interactive
copy.desc28502: Bubbles sent to a user from the meadow interactive
copy.desc28503: Postcards sent to a user from the Pixie Post Office
copy.desc28504: Gift Sets sent to a user from the Pixie Post Office
